Description: Very small ring bezel made of turquoise faience with hieroglyphic signs, 'Imn at the top, nb at the bottom, two further signs in between, difficult to identify, maybe Sn-ropes (Gradiner V7). The bezel is very flat and not well glazed at the underside, the parts where the ring itself was attached to the bezel, are still visible. The small size suggests it belonging to a child.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
